title: medicos Therapy
description:
The medicos Therapy App powered by Caspar

Use your therapist's knowledge at home:• Your individual training plan customized by your therapist is always available• Relaxation and knowledge for a more effective therapy• Further extensive support

Your individual training plan:• Created by your therapist• Configured according to your personal needs

User-friendly training videos:• The medicos Therapy App is very easy to use• Allow you to understand the correct exercise techniques enabling you to train well on your own

Monitor your therapy progress:• Connect your fitness wearables with the medicos Therapy App and be informed about your activity goals. In the future we will offer support for Apple HealthKit.• Rate your exercises and note your progress• Discuss results with your therapist

Get more in-depth therapy:• The medicos Therapy App allows you to exercise correctly with the appropriate intensity• Helps you optimise your therapy for significant improvements

Submit your suggestions for improvements to support@caspar-health.com as we value your feedback.
